text:
@Jarrapin People who have a #COVID19 test and the result is positive are required to isolate for 14 days. 
There is no paid leave for casual workers. 
Being tested while there's no financial assistance from @ScottMorrisonMP poses the risk that financial hardship may result. 
#PolicyFailure
